name: An Infinity's Choice
description:
The story is experimental, not a lot of stuff is final and I mostly have no idea what I am doing. Have fun with what I have at the moment.

Also, this is the first game I have created.

(No I don't want you to be nice I want you to help if you want to and I want to know what I should do to make this better for what it is at the moment.)

The faith of this game is unknown.

More information will be added over time...
